summary: THE DEATH OF CAPTAIN MARVEL TPB NEW PRINTING! Written by STAN LEE, ROY THOMAS, JIM STARLIN, STEVE ENGLEHART & DOUG MOENCH...
caption:
THE DEATH OF CAPTAIN MARVEL TPB

NEW PRINTING!
Written by STAN LEE, ROY THOMAS, JIM STARLIN, STEVE ENGLEHART & DOUG MOENCH
Penciled by GENE COLAN, JIM STARLIN & PAT BRODERICK
Cover by JIM STARLIN
As Protector of the Universe and de facto defender of Earth, the Kree Captain Mar-Vell has triumphed over foes large and small. But when Mar-Vell is diagnosed with cancer, he finds himself face-to-face with a foe that even his vast might can’t defeat — and both he, and a universe that loves him, must rally together to accept the inevitable. Plus: The classic adventures that introduced Mar-Vell, the seminal battle with Nitro that began his descent into illness — and, in the midst of a battle against Titan’s planet-sized computer system, corrupted by Thanos’ madness, witness the budding romance between Mar-Vell and his true love Elysius! Guest-starring the Avengers, the X-Men, the Fantastic Four and more! Collecting MARVEL SUPER-HEROES (1967) #12-13, CAPTAIN MARVEL (1968) #1 and #34, MARVEL SPOTLIGHT (1979) #1-2 and MARVEL GRAPHIC NOVEL #1: THE DEATH OF CAPTAIN MARVEL.
168 PGS./Rated T+ …$19.99
ISBN: 978-1-302-91593-3

summary: 'We Want the Trailer' boys for Marvel Studios' Captain Marvel (2019)
title: 'We Want the Trailer' boys for Marvel Studios' Captain Marvel (2019)
body:
’#WeWantTheTrailer’ boys for @MarvelStudios’ #CaptainMarvel (2019)

Who are they? Are they asking for Marvel Studios’ Captain Marvel (2019)?

Looks like they wanted it.

A video by Kirk Deveyck was uploaded on YouTube yesterday demanding for the trailer of Marvel Studios‘ Captain Marvel (2019) to be uploaded on YouTube on September 3rd or 4th. And they’re tired of:

  • Spider-Man: Far From Home,
  • Marvel…

View On WordPress

summary:
Perhaps a controversial opinion, but I think renaming Captain Marvel to Shazam is the way to go
Sure he was Captain Marvel...
body:
Perhaps a controversial opinion, but I think renaming Captain Marvel to Shazam is the way to go

Sure he was Captain Marvel first, but Shazam feels better to me. It sounds more magical (which he is) and I can’t say it without feeling a little like a kid (which fits as well)

Marvel can keep the name, really

reblog.comment:
Perhaps a controversial opinion, but I think renaming Captain Marvel to Shazam is the way to go

Sure he was Captain Marvel first, but Shazam feels better to me. It sounds more magical (which he is) and I can’t say it without feeling a little like a kid (which fits as well)

Marvel can keep the name, really

trail.content_raw:
Perhaps a controversial opinion, but I think renaming Captain Marvel to Shazam is the way to go

Sure he was Captain Marvel first, but Shazam feels better to me. It sounds more magical (which he is) and I can’t say it without feeling a little like a kid (which fits as well)

Marvel can keep the name, really
trail.content:
Perhaps a controversial opinion, but I think renaming Captain Marvel to Shazam is the way to go

Sure he was Captain Marvel first, but Shazam feels better to me. It sounds more magical (which he is) and I can’t say it without feeling a little like a kid (which fits as well)

Marvel can keep the name, really

blog.name: why-i-love-comics
blog.title: A blog dedicated to all your favorite moments
blog.description: Batman, Say it fast. Really fast. As fast as you can. Over and over. So what do you hear? Badman. Bad. Man. Batman. Badman. To me... Now and forever... one and                                             the same. - Peter J. Tomasi                                                                         all spoiler posts are tagged "wednesday spoilers"                                             add me on snapchapt! taskrnaster (with an RN instead of M)

summary: yeah hi, um captain marvel, as in shazam, as in billy batson, as in that cute little homeless kid and his twin sister mary...
body: yeah hi, um captain marvel, as in shazam, as in billy batson, as in that cute little homeless kid and his twin sister mary batson and their bff freddy freeman, yeah those captain marvels, yeah they’re dc not marvel. like just a distinction i think is important to know. no biggie out here lads. but different. not the same. thanks.

reblog.comment: yeah hi, um captain marvel, as in shazam, as in billy batson, as in that cute little homeless kid and his twin sister mary batson and their bff freddy freeman, yeah those captain marvels, yeah they’re dc not marvel. like just a distinction i think is important to know. no biggie out here lads. but different. not the same. thanks.

trail.content_raw: yeah hi, um captain marvel, as in shazam, as in billy batson, as in that cute little homeless kid and his twin sister mary batson and their bff freddy freeman, yeah those captain marvels, yeah they’re dc not marvel. like just a distinction i think is important to know. no biggie out here lads. but different. not the same. thanks.
trail.content: yeah hi, um captain marvel, as in shazam, as in billy batson, as in that cute little homeless kid and his twin sister mary batson and their bff freddy freeman, yeah those captain marvels, yeah they’re dc not marvel. like just a distinction i think is important to know. no biggie out here lads. but different. not the same. thanks.
